content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ricston UK Limited, a private limited liability company incorporated under the laws of England and Wales with company registration number 09031573, and having its registered office at 49 Station Road, Ainsdale, Southport, England, PR8 3HH (“Ricston”) is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This privacy notice describes how we collect and use personal information about you when you are providing services to Ricston, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation 2016 (“GDPR”).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are receiving this privacy notice because you will be providing services to Ricston as an independent contractor. This is separate to any privacy notice you have already received about any recruitment or application process the general privacy notice for general use of our corporate websites.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We may update this notice at any time.  Where we can, we will notify applicants of substantial changes to the privacy notice.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ricston is a \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding how we hold and use personal information about you.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are required under data protection legislation to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice. It is important that you read this notice so that you are aware of how and why we use your personal data.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
